entity.name: MARPRIPINFO
entity.query: select ID,entname,SUPERORGID,REGNO,lerep,oploc,opscope,enttype,enttypeitem,industryphy, substr(industryco,1,2) as industrycoda, (case length(industryco) when 3 then industryco when 4 then substr(industryco,1,3) end) as industrycoxi, (case length(industryco) when 4 then industryco end) as industrycoxiao, venind,optype,enttypepro,state,regtype,estDate,apprdate,ORGID from REG_MARPRIPINFO

entity.name: entrecordno
entity.query: select ARCHNO from REG_ENTRECORDNO where MARPRID='${MARPRIPINFO.ID}' and REGNO='${MARPRIPINFO.REGNO}'

entity.name: creinfo
entity.query: select CredLevel from CRE_CreInfo where MarPrID='${MARPRIPINFO.ID}'

entity.name: v_organ
entity.query: select ZID from V_ORGAN where ('${MARPRIPINFO.SUPERORGID}' is not null and '${MARPRIPINFO.SUPERORGID}' != '') and ROOTID='${MARPRIPINFO.SUPERORGID}'

entity.name: v_organ_reg
entity.query: select ZID from V_ORGAN where ('${MARPRIPINFO.ORGID}' is not null and '${MARPRIPINFO.ORGID}' != '') and ROOTID='${MARPRIPINFO.ORGID}'
